lead_paragraph: The arrival of the opposition leader, Riek Machar, in the capital was delayed by a dispute over how many weapons and soldiers could accompany him.

headline.print_headline: South Sudan Faces Delays That Imperil Peace Talks
headline.main: South Sudan Peace Talks Imperiled by New Squabbles

snippet: The arrival of the opposition leader, Riek Machar, in the capital was delayed by a dispute over how many weapons and soldiers could accompany him.
abstract: Squabbles between rival factions threaten to scuttle peace agreement aimed at ending South Sudan's brutal civil war; at issue is number of troops and level of arms opposition leader Riek Machar can bring into capital, where he is scheduled to begin forming transitional government with Pres Salva Kiir.
